tours.title: Marrakech to Merzouga Desert Tour
tours.excerpt: A full 3 Days desert tour your from Marrakech to Merzouga. Discover the Sahara Desert of Merzouga.
additionalInfo: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before the tour

tours.title: Marrakech to Erg Chegaga Tour
tours.excerpt: Discover the Erg Chegaga desert of Morocco and explore the fascinating village of M'hamid.

tours.title: Morocco Imperial Cities Tour
tours.excerpt: Experience our long Morocco Imperial Tours, visit the most beautiful cities and villages from south to North.

tours.title: Essaouira-Mogador Excursion
tours.excerpt: Enjoy the beauty of coastal city of Essouira, visit the portuges Port and the old Medina and live the Ganwi vibes.

reviews.author: John Doe
reviews.reviewDescription: The tour was fantastic! Our guide was knowledgeable and the itinerary was well planned. Highly recommend!

reviews.author: Jane Smith
reviews.reviewDescription: The booking process was smooth and the customer service was excellent. The accommodation exceeded our expectations.

reviews.author: Michael Brown
reviews.reviewDescription: We had a wonderful time. The tour was affordable and well worth the money. Would book again.

reviews.author: David Black
reviews.reviewDescription: One of the best experiences we've had. The locations were great and guise was super.
